title: Provides that businesses utilizing textile remanufacturing technologies shall be allowed a textile remanufacturing investment tax credit
summary: Provides that property principally used in the ordinary course of the taxpayer's trade or business utilizing textile remanufacturing technologies shall be allowed a textile remanufacturing investment tax credit; defines textile remanufacturing technologies.
